item.title: Announcing Unified SOX & DORA Compliance Solutions in Microsoft Sentinel
item.description: Empowering Financial Institutions to Meet Modern Regulatory Demands As financial organizations navigate increasingly complex regulatory landscapes, two frameworks stand out for their impact and rigor: the Sarbanes-Oxley Act (SOX) and the Digital Operational Resilience Act (DORA). Microsoft Sentinel now offers dedicated solutions for both, enabling security and compliance teams to achieve continuous, audit-ready compliance across cloud and enterprise environments.
